Content: *p73459ra0236*do not write in this area do not write in this area do not write in this area2  section aanswer all questions.for questions 110, in section a, select one answer from a to d and put a cross in the box . if you change your mind, put a line through the box  and then mark your new answer with a cross .1  which of the following is the number of neutrons in a nucleus of 12151sb?a 51b 70c 121d 172(total for question 1 = 1 mark)2  what is the process by which electrons are released from a heated filament?a excitationb ionisationc photoelectric emissiond thermionic emission(total for question 2 = 1 mark)
